definition: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
kjvTranslation: act, advice, affair, answer, [idiom] any such (thing), because of, book, business, care, case, cause, certain rate, [phrase] chronicles, commandment, [idiom] commune(-ication), [phrase] concern(-ing), [phrase] confer, counsel, [phrase] dearth, decree, deed, [idiom] disease, due, duty, effect, [phrase] eloquent, errand, (evil favoured-) ness, [phrase] glory, [phrase] harm, hurt, [phrase] iniquity, [phrase] judgment, language, [phrase] lying, manner, matter, message, (no) thing, oracle, [idiom] ought, [idiom] parts, [phrase] pertaining, [phrase] please, portion, [phrase] power, promise, provision, purpose, question, rate, reason, report, request, [idiom] (as hast) said, sake, saying, sentence, [phrase] sign, [phrase] so, some (uncleanness), somewhat to say, [phrase] song, speech, [idiom] spoken, talk, task, [phrase] that, [idiom] there done, thing (concerning), thought, [phrase] thus, tidings, what(-soever), [phrase] wherewith, which, word, work.

translations.bg: дума; по подразбиране, въпрос (за който се говори) или вещ; с наречие, причина
translations.cs: slovo; implicitně věc (jak se o ní mluví) nebo věc; adverbiálně příčina
translations.da: et ord; underforstået, en sag (som der tales om) eller ting; adverbialt, en årsag
translations.de: ein Wort; implizit eine Sache oder ein Ding; adverbial eine Ursache
translations.el: μια λέξη- κατ' επέκταση, ένα θέμα (όπως αναφέρεται) ή ένα πράγμα- επιρρηματικά, μια αιτία
translations.es: una palabra; implícitamente, un asunto (del que se habla) o cosa; adverbialmente, una causa
translations.et: sõna; kaudselt asi (nagu räägitakse) või asi; adverbiaalselt põhjus
translations.fi: sana; implisiittisesti asia (kuten puhutaan) tai asia; adverbiaalisesti syy
translations.fr: un mot ; par implication, une matière (comme on en parle) ou une chose ; adverbialement, une cause
translations.hu: egy szó; értelemszerűen egy dolog (ahogyan beszélnek róla) vagy egy dolog; határozószóval: egy ok
translations.id: sebuah kata; dengan implikasi, suatu hal (seperti yang dibicarakan) atau benda; secara adverbial, penyebab
translations.it: una parola; per implicazione, una materia (di cui si parla) o una cosa; avverbialmente, una causa
translations.ko: 단어; 암시적으로, 문제 (말한대로) 또는 사물; 부사적으로, 원인
translations.lt: žodis; netiesiogiai - dalykas (apie kurį kalbama) arba daiktas; prieveiksmis - priežastis
translations.lv: vārds; netieši - lieta (kā par to tiek runāts) vai lieta; apstākļa vārds - cēlonis
translations.nb: et ord; underforstått, en sak (som det snakkes om) eller ting; adverbialt, en årsak
translations.nl: een woord; impliciet, een zaak of ding; bijwoordelijk, een oorzaak
translations.pl: słowo; w domyśle, sprawa (o której się mówi) lub rzecz; przysłówkowo, przyczyna
translations.pt: uma palavra; implicitamente, um assunto (tal como é dito) ou uma coisa; adverbialmente, uma causa
translations.ro: un cuvânt; implicit, o chestiune (așa cum se vorbește) sau un lucru; adverbial, o cauză
translations.ru: слово; по смыслу - дело (о котором говорится) или вещь; наречие - причина
translations.sk: slovo; implicitne vec (ako sa o nej hovorí) alebo vec; adverbiálne príčina
translations.sl: beseda; implicitno zadeva (kot se govori) ali stvar; prislovno, vzrok
translations.sv: ett ord; underförstått, en fråga (som det talas om) eller sak; adverbiellt, en orsak
translations.tr: bir kelime; ima yoluyla, bir konu (konuşulduğu gibi) veya şey; zarf olarak, bir neden
translations.uk: слово; підтекстом - справа (про яку говорять) або річ; прислівниково - причина
translations.zh: 一个词；暗示，一件事（如所说的）或一件事；副词，一个原因
